name: Toshiaki Shirakura
subtitle: I was born in React. I grew up with React. I am a React Native.
description: #安倍晋三エクスプローラー #ガチ有能AI助手 and more | Mobile app Developer | React, React Native, GatsbyJS, Flutter, Python | PC DIY

apps.name: PolyMorph
apps.subtitle: 幾何学図形をぐりぐり回転
apps.localizedDescription: スライダーを動かすだけで、多面体が変形！カラフルな3D多面体を指でぐりぐり回転させて、幾何学の美しさを体感しよう。シンプルだけど不思議とハマる、新感覚の3Dビューアーアプリです。

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Use the photo library to change your avatar.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow PolyMorph to access your microphone
